article_title: New Preceptorship Method Developed At Frank H. Netter School Of Medicine To Train Primary Care Doctors

article_metadata.description: Quinnipiac University (Photo credit: Wikipedia) The shortage of primary care doctors in the US is certain to have far reaching effects over the next several decades. With recent data indicating roughly 12 percent of medical school graduates entering primary care, the growing concern—spurred increasingly by millions of soon to be insured [...]
